show.title: Investing in Regenerative Agriculture and Food

title: Soil Builders, 40M for carbon farming in AU and transitioning a 1000a farm using regenerative approaches
subtitle: Soil Builders, 40M for carbon farming in AU and transitioning a 1000a farm using regenerative approaches
summary:
A check in interview with Lachy Ritchie, co founder of Agtalent and Carbon Farming Foundation who is getting ready to invest 40M in carbon farming. Plus Tyler and Tim Nuss of The Modern Acre, who are transitioning their 1000 acres row crop vegetable farm using regenerative approaches.

-----------------------------------------------------

Join our Gumroad community, discover the tiers and benefits here: www.gumroad.com/investinginregenag.

------------------------------------------------------
In the Soil Builders series we welcome back previous friends of the podcast to understand their progress and we discover new companies, startups, farmers, investors engaged in building soil all over the world.

More about this episode and the Soil Builders series on https://investinginregenerativeagriculture.com/soil-builders-4/
